name: AmericInn Lodge & Suites Saugatuck _ Douglas

reviews.text: Overall this was a fine hotel. We were in town for a wedding so we weren't in the hotel much. But, I wish when I called to request a crib the hotel would have told me that the 2 room suite I booked was up a flight of stairs and that there was no elevator.
reviews.title: Feels more like an Inn than a Motel
Good location for beach visit
reviews.text: The suite was nice, sitting room, hot tub etc, but lugging the stroller up the steps was not great. And we couldn't switch rooms because the hotel was completely booked one of the nights. I did complain on the survey we got after staying there and got a nice apology email from the manager. And, our room card kept de-magnetizing despite not being kept near wallet or cell phone. But we got no money off when we checked out which was a surprise considering the inconveniences.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The complimentary "continental plus" breakfast was great. There were waffles, hard boiled eggs, and a few other things besides cereal and pastry.
reviews.title: This is a great place to stay!!
Clean and comfortable
reviews.text: We arrived very early in the day, around 10am and were unable to check in early which was disappointing since we were tired.

aka: Americinn Lodge & Suites Saugatuck _ Douglas Hotel Douglas
